document.full_text: spain's governing socialists chose deputy prime minister alfredo perez rubalcaba as leader for what analysts see as a doomed campaign to reverse slumping fortunes ahead of a general election next year.
document.title: spain pm backs veteran rubalcaba as successor
lines_and_colors: spain's governing socialists chose deputy prime minister alfredo perez rubalcaba as leader for what analysts see as a doomed campaign to reverse slumping fortunes ahead of a general election next year.
